segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster, water everywhere—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just drying that plate, ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the dirty puddle, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is clogged or something, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids sneaking cookies, but look at that stool—filthy risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hands in the jar, probably getting crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waiting like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water ruining the cabinets, staining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, who knows how clean they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel she's using looks damp already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden is tidy, but inside is repulsive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're letting this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Slippery floor from the overflow—nasty accident waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR
